057050.KS.summary: Hyundai Home Shopping Network Corporation operates as an online shopping company in South Korea. It offers clothing and underwear products, shoes, fashion accessories, cosmetics/beauty products, watches, jewel and luxury goods, sport and leisure products, childbirth and infant products, kitchen/life/health products, food, furniture/bedding/construction products, consumer electronics/digital products, hobbies/pets, travel/insurance/rental products, and other miscellaneous goods. The company offers its products through cable, satellite, and IPTV, as well as mobile and Internet shopping channels. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
